Literature.Title: Designing ?-helical peptides with enhanced synergism and selectivity against Mycobacterium smegmatis: Discerning the role of hydrophobicity and helicity.
Literature.Author: Khara JS, Lim FK, Wang Y, Ke XY, Voo ZX, Yang YY, Lakshminarayanan R, Ee PL

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>500 µg/ml,Rat erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>1000 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis ATCC 23857(MIC=500µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=250-500µg/ml),Mycobacterium smegmatis ATCC 14468(MIC=125µg/ml),Mycobacterium bovis BCG(MIC=500µg/ml),Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Rv(MIC=>500µg/ml),Mycobacterium tuberculosis CSU87(MIC=>500µg/ml)
